Smart Key Fob with Built-In GPS Tracker: Develop a key fob that includes a built-in GPS tracker, allowing users to locate their car in real-time through a mobile app. This innovation can increase the convenience of finding a lost car and provide an added layer of security by allowing users to track their vehicle's location. Confidence Score: 0.8

Biometric Key Fob: Create a key fob that utilizes biometric technology, such as fingerprint recognition or facial recognition, to unlock the car. This innovation can provide an additional layer of security by ensuring that only authorized users can access the vehicle. Confidence Score: 0.9

Keyless Entry System with Smartphone Integration: Develop a keyless entry system that allows users to unlock their car using their smartphone. This innovation can provide a more convenient and seamless entry experience, as users will no longer need to physically locate their keys. Confidence Score: 0.8

Smart Key Fob with Personalized Settings: Create a key fob that allows users to personalize their car's settings, such as the temperature, lighting, and entertainment system, using their smartphone. This innovation can provide a more convenient and personalized driving experience. Confidence Score: 0.7

Key Fob with Built-In Power Bank: Develop a key fob that includes a built-in power bank, allowing users to charge their smartphone or other devices on the go. This innovation can provide a convenient and practical solution for users who are always on the move. Confidence Score: 0.8
